price: 5. Bango wana nde bakozala na etumbu ya mabe, mpe o mokolo ya suka bakozala bazangi mpenza.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna lahum sūu al-ʿadhābi wahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
